name: AudioTrackList
description: The AudioTrackList interface is used to represent a list of the audio tracks contained within a given HTML media element, with each track represented by a separate AudioTrack object in the list.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'AudioTrackList' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.

refs.name: HTML5
refs.description: The definition of 'AudioTrackList' in the 'HTML5' specification.
